About picostack

You are running picostack version {% picostack_version %}

A super lightweight KVM virtualization manager, suitable for single linux-based host system.

Note that picostack is not designed to provide cloud service, but to be used on top of a single server appliance. It can be put to run on powerful high-end machines with a lot of RAM and CPU resources, that can be split and virtualized into kvm boxes. It has a django-based interface and a daemon that does the main work like taking care of and running VM instances in the background. Such approach can smooth the transition to the cloud technology.
